page.title: 06HEALTH CARE IN MELBOURNE
page.content: THERE ARE 2 MEDICAL PRACTICES IN MELBOURNE RUN BY DR.MACKELLAR AND DRS. FREEMAN AND BLACK WITH NURSING HELP. THE CLINIC IN PENN LANE IS FOR CHILD CARE AND IS RUN BY THE D.C.C. HEALTH VISITORS TAKE CARE OF PRE_SCHOOL HEALTH,WEIGHING BABIES WEEKLY,GIVING INJECTIONS AND SELLING BABY FOOD. 2 DENTISTS TAKE CARE OF OUR TEETH,AND AN OPTICIAN LOOKS AFTER OUR EYESIGHT. 2 CHIROPIDISTS TEND OUR FEET AND THE LOCAL LABOUR PARTY RUNS A WEEKLY ADVICE BUREAU TO HELP PEOPLE TO UNDERSTAND AND CLAIM SOCIAL WELFARE AND STATE BENEFITS.PARKINSON THE CHEMIST PROVIDES A SERVICE FOR PRESCRIPTIONS AND SELLS ITEMS FOR MEDICAL CARE.MORE SERIOUS MEDICAL PROBLEMS ARE DEALT WITH IN THE LARGE HOSPITALS IN THE NEARBY URBAN AREAS, LIKE DERBY,NOTTINGHAM AND LEICESTER.
